itunes:title: #70: What if I Can't Get Better [Student Highlight]
title: #70: What if I Can't Get Better [Student Highlight]
itunes:author: Shena Lashey
itunes:subtitle: You're doing your healing process (or you're thinking about starting) and you have this fear about what if I can't get better? What if this is all I will ever be? What if I try to change but don't actually improve? This can make you feel defeated...
itunes:summary:
You're doing your healing process (or you're thinking about starting) and you have this fear about what if I can't get better? What if this is all I will ever be? What if I try to change but don't actually improve?

This can make you feel defeated before you even start. In this episode, we're going to talk about what those pauses mean and how they are actually proof of your improvement. 

 

7 Ways to Not Be Stressed and Codependent in Relationships in 2021 [Free Webinar]
